Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach

Record Class Options

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.github.sormuras.bach.Options
Record Components:
info - an optional project declaration instance, may be null
out - a stream to which "expected" output should be written
err - a stream to which any error messages should be written
flags - a set of feature toggles passed individually like --verbose --help ...
actions - the list of actions to execute passed individually like info build ...
tool - an optional command to execute passed via tool NAME [ARGS...]
public record Options(Optional<ProjectInfo> info, PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, Set<Options.Flag> flags, Map<Options.Property,​List<String>> properties, List<String> actions, Optional<Tool> tool) extends Record
An options descriptor.

    • of

      public static Options of​(String... args)
      Returns an instance of Options parsed from the given command-line arguments.

      This convenient overload wraps the System.out and System.err streams into automatically flushing PrintWriter objects and delegates to of(PrintWriter, PrintWriter, String...).

      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments to parse
      Returns:
      an instance of Options parsed from the given command-line arguments

    • of

      public static Options of​(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, String... args)
      Returns an instance of Options parsed from the given command-line arguments.
      Parameters:
      out - a stream to which "expected" output should be written
      err - a stream to which any error messages should be written
      args - the command-line arguments to parse
      Returns:
      an instance of Options parsed from the given command-line arguments

      public final String toString()

    • equals

      public final boolean equals​(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
